fr.label: Tous les processus requis sont actifs

MaxUptime.query: SELECT '' AS error FROM uptime WHERE total_seconds / 60 / 60 / 24 > 30;

DriveEncryption.query: SELECT '' AS error FROM registry WHERE path = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\BitlockerStatus\BootStatus' AND data != '1';

LockScreen.query:
SELECT 'Screen lock not required on resume' AS error FROM registry WHERE path = 'HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Desktop\ScreenSaverIsSecure' AND data != '1'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Screen lock timeout too high: ' || data AS error FROM registry WHERE path = 'HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Desktop\ScreenSaveTimeOut' AND CAST(data AS INTEGER) > 600
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Screen lock disabled' AS error FROM registry WHERE path = 'HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Desktop\ScreenSaveActive' AND data != '1'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'No screen saver program specified' AS error 
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
  SELECT 1 
  FROM registry 
  WHERE path = 'HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Desktop\SCRNSAVE.EXE' 
);

Firewall.query: SELECT '' AS error FROM windows_security_center WHERE firewall != 'Good';

ProtectionStatus.query:
SELECT 'internet settings = ' || internet_settings AS error FROM windows_security_center WHERE internet_settings != 'Good'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Windows Security Center = ' || windows_security_center_service AS error FROM windows_security_center WHERE windows_security_center_service != 'Good'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'User Account Control = ' || user_account_control AS error FROM windows_security_center WHERE user_account_control != 'Good';

en.label: Windows Security Centre features are active

fr.label: Fonctionnalités Windows Security Centre sont activées

AutoUpdates.query:
SELECT 'AUOptions = ' || data AS error
FROM (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN policies.name IS NOT NULL THEN policies.data
      ELSE normal.data
    END AS data
  FROM
    (
      SELECT name,data FROM registry
      WHERE path = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\WindowsUpdate\AU\AUOptions'
    ) AS policies
  FULL OUTER JOIN
    (
		  SELECT name,data FROM registry
		  WHERE path = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\WindowsUpdate\Auto Update\AUOptions'
    ) AS normal
  ON 1=1
) AS update_policy
WHERE CAST(data AS INTEGER) < 4

UNION ALL 

SELECT 'NoAutoUpdate = ' || data AS error
FROM registry
WHERE path = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\WindowsUpdate\AU\NoAutoUpdate' AND data = '1'

UNION ALL

SELECT 'Windows Update service = ' || status AS error
FROM services
WHERE name = 'wuauserv' AND status != 'RUNNING';

fr.label: Mises à jour automatiques sont activées

Antivirus.query: SELECT '' AS error FROM windows_security_center WHERE antivirus != 'Good'

SharingPreferences.query:
SELECT 'Remote Desktop is enabled' AS error FROM registry WHERE path = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Terminal Server\fDenyTSConnections' AND data = '0'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'File and Printer Sharing is enabled' FROM services WHERE name = 'LanmanServer' AND start_type != 'DISABLED'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Remote Registry is enabled' FROM services WHERE name = 'RemoteRegistry' AND start_type != 'DISABLED';

SSHKeys.query: SELECT path AS error FROM user_ssh_keys WHERE encrypted = 0;

BootOptions.query: SELECT 'UEFI secure boot is disabled' AS error FROM registry WHERE path = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\SecureBoot\State\UEFISecureBootEnabled' AND data != 1;

RemovableStorage.query: SELECT device_id AS error FROM logical_drives WHERE description LIKE '%removable%';

SensitiveFiles.query: SELECT replace(path, 'C:\\Users\\{{username}}\\', '') AS error FROM file WHERE (path LIKE 'C:\\Users\\{{username}}\\Downloads\\%password%emergency%kit.pdf' OR path LIKE 'C:\\Users\\{{username}}\\Downloads\\%backup%code%' OR path LIKE 'C:\\Users\\{{username}}\\Downloads\\%recovery%code%' OR path LIKE 'C:\\Users\\{{username}}\\Downloads\\%password%');

ExportedFiles.query: SELECT replace(path, 'C:\\Users\\{{username}}\\', '') AS error FROM file WHERE (path LIKE 'C:\\Users\\{{username}}\\Downloads\\%export%.csv' OR path LIKE 'C:\\Users\\{{username}}\\Downloads\\%export%.json' OR path LIKE 'C:\\Users\\{{username}}\\Downloads\\%export%.txt') AND atime <= (strftime('%s','now') - (30 * 24 * 60 * 60));

UnusedFiles.query: SELECT replace(path, 'C:\\Users\\{{username}}\\', '') AS error FROM file WHERE path LIKE 'C:\\Users\\{{username}}\\Downloads\\%' AND atime <= (strftime('%s','now') - (90 * 24 * 60 * 60));
